de.uniba.kinf.jerusalem.gui.view.map

Class JerMapComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JLayeredPane
            • de.uniba.kinf.jerusalem.gui.view.map.JerMapComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class JerMapComponent
extends javax.swing.JLayeredPane
implements java.util.Observer
    Provides layout for JerMapLayer, JerMapOverlay. Has mouse listener to register actions on pane.
    Author:
    Hanno Wierichs
